attributes.action: Rename the road through Wooton Bassett to "Highway for Heroes"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Wooton Bassett has become infamous, for the people showing the utmost respect to our Heroes who have paid the ultimate price.

We believe that the road should renamed to continue to show this respect for our Soldiers

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
